item.title: NextView Ventures Podcast
item.description: In its essence, data scienceis the practice of learning insights from a data set and building a product based upon these learnings. The Fast Forward Labs team starts every data advisory engagement, be this with small startup or large enterprise clients, with a data census comprising three questions: What data do we have? This is often harder to answer than it seems, especially in large enterprises with siloâ€™d departments.
